reviews.review_msg: She is not good at teaching, just read the textbook. The midterm is fair, but the assignment is too much. Overall, she don't know how to teach
Good prof and funny too. Good notes always posted online. Grading is fair, very acessible for extra help.
Dr. Curzon's Energy and the Environment course was a major eye opener.  This is a class that needs to be taught well and it was by Curzon.

he is rude to student, and doesn't accept someone's assignment even it is only one minute late.  always repeat himself on how on time he is for class and criticize student for being a litle late...but the worst thing after all is the long exams
